messageBody:
2009/3/30 David Saff <david@...>:
> You could write a custom runner that used XmlUnit to produce exactly
> the results you're talking about, I think. I'm not sure how
> validating essential XML files is different from non-essential XML
> files.
>
> David Saff

I was going to suggest using @Suite, but I'm not familiar with the 4.x
usage. I think for 3.8.x, I would have done something like;

public static Test suite() {
TestSuite result = new TestSuite();

for dir in directories {
schema = getSchema(dir)
for file in directory {
result.addTest(new ValidateXmlFileTest(file, schema));
}
}

return result;
}

Cheers,

James
